Column 3: On Motion to Discharge Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1834) to advance policy priorities that will break the gridlock

On Agreeing to the Resolution Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4593) the SHOWER Act; providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5184) the Affordable HOMES Act; and providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 6938) making consolidated appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2026, and for other purposes
